Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the effectiveness of PCR tests for detecting COVID-19 by stating that they are ineffective.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support for the assertion that the new vaccine will weaken immune systems.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that COVID-19 is a "mass extermination program" and that the vaccine will infect and kill people, without providing any credible evidence for these assumptions.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that COVID-19 is the name given to the disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, as determined by the World Health Organization.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores alternative explanations and attributes the control and reduction of populations to a conspiracy theory involving Bill Gates, without providing any credible evidence.
